Only small drawback I can see is that not all apps are yet designed to work on iPad though they work perfectly with iPhone.  But that has no relation with quality of iPad itself and hence my rating goes as 5 star

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love Love it
Reviews.Author: Cornelia S. Williams "connie"
Reviews.Content: Don't know what I ever did without my iPad.  I use it everyday and would really hate to have to be without it for any length of time.  It has nearly replaced my computer.

Reviews.Title: We love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: kristin anderson
Reviews.Content: It makes going away easier since we now don't need to lug around computers. Easy to use. Great gift from our family.

Reviews.Title: I love this iPad But...
Reviews.Author: RusticBeauty
Reviews.Content: I love this iPad, but this bad boy has some weight on it. When holding it for a short period of time, I have to put down and rest my hands.. Other than that, what's not to love? It's a great tablet. It's fast, colorful, capable and fun. I enjoy it very much!

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad w/Retina Display
Reviews.Author: M. Gonzales
Reviews.Content: I am still on a learning curve, looking for and finding apps which is why I did not give this a five star rating.  Does not work like a computer and it is hard to make the transition.  But so far so good.  This replaces another table I had purchased which was easily returned to Amazon with no problem (thanks Amazon, your the best!)I believe that once I have everything linked, I will love it more.  Have used it to read a Kindle book and watch a movie but I know there is much more that I can do with it.  Will post more once I have had it a bit longer.

Reviews.Title: Can't live without it
Reviews.Author: A. Garza "Amazon Addict"
Reviews.Content: If you're trying to decide between an iPad and a Kindle Fire .. I have both, the iPad is more versatile and you're not stuck with the carousel layout of the Fire. I'm not knocking the Fire it is awesome and perfect for Amazon Prime membership, but as far as versatility and ease of use, go iPad! This vendor shipped in a timely manner, well packaged. Happy buyer.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Hoffman
Reviews.Content: I love my new iPad. I have had it a few months now and am still learning all the things It/I can do. I was a little apprehensive at first about ordering this on line in stead of the store.It came in perfect condition and arrived early.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Habib H.
Reviews.Content: Superb...!It is even better than the iPAD3 ,It is definitely faster  and has a little bit better retina display than its predecessorBut it still gets HOT

Reviews.Title: I use this daily
Reviews.Author: ASMEQC
Reviews.Content: I don't really have anything to compare this to however I can say that I use it daily it is nice to be able to sit on the couch and surf the net. The freedom of not being stuck to a desk is great. The battery gives me plenty of charge I do not use it but a few hours of the day and usually only have to charge it every three days. The one thing I do not like that irritates me is that it is not flash compatible. This is the only notepad computer I have used so I really have nothing to compare it to. I would love to get my hands on something using the android operating system to compare. One feature this has that I use a lot is voice dictation which I am using right now it makes entering data very very fast. I do plan on purchasing set of speakers that is Bluetooth compatible, the sound on this is acceptable for general use but if you want to enjoy music external speakers are a must. Note this only has one speaker.

Reviews.Title: ipad retina 32gb, white
Reviews.Author: James R. Henry
Reviews.Content: seems to work just fine...takes and holds charge well.  bought a case/cover for it, too.  like the speed and gyro switching.

Reviews.Title: The nicest, and, very nice to own!
Reviews.Author: Carol Hubbard
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad. I'm purchasing it for my 66th birthday!! Who else is going to do that but me!!  I'm a gadget person and love technology. When I purchased my iMac (27") desktop - "wow" is all I can say.  It is beautiful. I have the iPhone 4S and I love Siri so I know I will enjoy her on my iPad as well.  The processor for my ipad will be like lightning and I look forward to using the iPad in a more leisurely way,  I've waited to get the newer model for the Retina Display.  Apple technology is great!!  My iPad is on the way Once I use it, I provide more feedback later.  Until then, I'm anxiously awaiting my new toy!Carol

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: marcomb17
Reviews.Content: Justo a tiempo y totalmente nuevo!!!!!!!!!!!!!RecomendadoEmpresa muy seria, sin ningún tipo de complicación.El producto tal como lo describen.Mi ipad 4 excelente!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: fausto
Reviews.Content: This ipad is fantastic. I can realized many works with the help of this product. I think made a good invertion

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: herve pugin
Reviews.Content: very good product, come in time at a good price. works good, I'm to buy this product. I will recommend it

Reviews.Title: It's an iPad!
Reviews.Author: A. Portsmouth
Reviews.Content: This is my second iPad.  Love the improvements; the crystal-clear screen, the camera and the upgraded speed.  I've had a Kindle Fire and a Nook -- and there are dozens of other tablets available -- but NOTHING compares to an iPad.  Period.

Reviews.Title: I'm a convert!
Reviews.Author: John Donovan "jdonovan"
Reviews.Content: I've long resisted getting a tablet, thinking of it as an under powered, limited alternative to a notebook computer--and I have a very nice one of those (Sony Vaio). Well, I was wrong! For traveling--whether to the couch or remote trade shows--I'll be taking my iPad instead of my notebook; there's nothing I'll be doing away from my desktop tower machine that the iPad can't handle. The display is absolutely stunning, the speed is very impressive, and the whole user interface--while slightly confusing to a Windows user--is FAR superior to anything Redmond has turned out. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Apple Rocks
Reviews.Author: FrazierHughescom
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure who I was ordering from but the shipping was fast, the product is mint, and apple by far is the best tablet. Nobody compares. That's why I have two! - HughesitOrLoseIt.com?

Reviews.Title: Love my ipad
Reviews.Author: carey dawson
Reviews.Content: I just got my ipad 4 for my bday and love it! The color is great and so easy to use. The camera features are nice.  This is my first ipad and i can't seem to put it down!

Reviews.Title: Good for kids
Reviews.Author: MikeC
Reviews.Content: This is a good tablet for the kids. They can do games and watch Netflix but it is not great for what I need. After being frustrated by its limitations, I purchased the Samsung Note 10.1 and found that I can do so much more on it. I am sure that Apple will catch up someday but for now it is just a toy for the kids.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: tezrah
Reviews.Content: User friendly, easy to learn. I bought this when my very old PC desktop started having serious issues. It is now my only computer. No complaints-highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Vanessa R. Lyle
Reviews.Content: I was afraid of buying this because I wanted to buy the Apple Care product protection. After contacting Apple, I was told if the serial number doesn't come back clean, I won't be able to purchase the Apple Care. This was such a good deal I was scared it might not be true, but it was!! The IPAD was originally purchased at Target which is a certified seller of IPads. I was able to purchase my Apple Care just fine and I also saved 200.00 off the retail price of a 128gb! Fantastic deal and I am in love with my IPAD!! THANK YOU SO MUCH!

Reviews.Title: Wife Loves It!
Reviews.Author: RobtheTechGuy
Reviews.Content: As if Apple needs another good review. I was debating between this and the Kindle Fire HDX for a Christmas present for my wife. I got the IPad because it was more functional. Yes the Kindle Fire HDX does Amazon content well but that's about all it does. Go with the IPad, you will love it!

Reviews.Title: Hubby's present
Reviews.Author: LikesComfortGal
Reviews.Content: He loves it !! He had a Kindle Fire and he liked it fine but wanted to be able to do more and the iPad is good for that !!I have one too and don't know what I would do without it !!!

Reviews.Title: Buy the new iPad Air. The 4th gen iPad was great but is now discontinued
Reviews.Author: DK
Reviews.Content: The iPad with Retina (4th gen) was a really nice tablet but it felt very heavy in your hands.  I prefer the full size display rather than the iPad Mini for my own needs, and would certainly recommend the Retina devices.  However, I'm writing this review AFTER the iPad Air was released and I strongly urge you to buy the iPad Air if you are considering a full-size iPad.  The new model is noticeably lighter, thinner and it is nearly 1 inch more narrow.  This change in width makes a huge difference when you thumb-type.

Reviews.Title: Present for the lady of the house.
Reviews.Author: BB
Reviews.Content: To clarify, my WIFE loves it, I am not an Apple fan, they are too 'elite' for me.  I was concerned that a new OS would be difficult for me to learn and that I would not be able to provide tech support.  However, this device is a breeze to use, my only issue is the combined settings 'app' for all the apps, I am not used to that feature.  Smooth graphics, installs many free programs through the app store, downloaded all the previously bought music from ITunes.  Downloaded iCloud to my Windows computer at home and can sync all her Firefox bookmarks onto the Safari browser.  I even downloaded Netflix, Amazon, Gmail, and Google Maps to deliver content in a more accustomed manner to the lady.  I hope she likes it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Chris Miller
Reviews.Content: Like it a lot. Got it for my ole lady and she loves it. Easy to use. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Aggravated
Reviews.Author: John A. Nunnikhoven "Bookworm"
Reviews.Content: I just discovered that this device will not print to my wifi enabled printer a Canon MX882. Now I'm stuck. Throw out a perfectly serviceable printer or set up a Dropbox or Evernote just to print form my laptop. Another major example of the hubris that characterizes so many American manufacturers

Reviews.Title: Still the best
Reviews.Author: Robert Buschkemper
Reviews.Content: This is my second iPad and I am convinced (again), after shopping the market, it is the  best value for tablets on the market.  I also own a Kindle Fire and appreciate it, especially for reading do to its size resolution, but for all around versaatility, endurance and apps iPad is my tablet of choice.

Reviews.Title: Why so expensive?
Reviews.Author: Marek Zalewski
Reviews.Content: The iPads work better than most Apple products, but certainly are not worth the exorbitant price. Two good Android tablets can easily be bought for the price of a single iPad. Maybe not as good, but very, very close.Have used my wife's full-size iPad and sort of like it, but my first generation, 7-inch Kindle Fire is almost as capable and much cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Lois H. Gelbert
Reviews.Content: I am unable to give a report because of age and loss of memory because of a stroke.  I was not aware that I would have so much to do to make it enjoyable.  I was hoping to be able to read a book and apply what I have read.  I have the Dummy Book for iPad. It is great reading but I probably have lost far more than I thought I did.  I will not give up because I think it will help me if I can do a few things.

Reviews.Title: Ehh
Reviews.Content: I rate it 3 because, i use to had the itouch second generation and I loved it! It had lots of space! But for my christmas gift I got this iPad. First i was really excited! but then i realizd that you couldnt have much apps, it took AGES for it to be completely charged! and i just dont like it as much as I did with my touch

Reviews.Title: It's all the same
Reviews.Author: Hai Tran
Reviews.Content: I have the first iPad and now the this one and really there isn't that much difference between the two except the retina display. Another thing, if you think you want to use the iPad for your PDF files, think again. It's a lot more trouble just to load the files, not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Never had an iPad before - I love it!
Reviews.Author: J. Page
Reviews.Content: So, this is my first iPad. I had waited and waited until I just couldn't do it anymore! Plus there were so many fellow parents telling me about this great learning app on their iPad for their kids.... My 5 year old son loves it! I put a bunch of games and educational stuff on their and he tools around and really loves it! It is very easy to use, mine arrived nicely packaged and I was able to set it up immediately. I would absolutely recommend this to others.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Joni E. Barker "dimples"
Reviews.Content: Was debating whether to get ipad with phone plan, but glad we got just the wifi ipad. Most places now have wifi, the service plans for iPads are soooo expensive (and of course most wifi is free), and u can download or rent movies that can be watched when no wifi is available (i.e car). Plus u can download a wifi finder so u don't have to HAVE wifi to find places where wifi can be accessed.

Reviews.Title: Recent purchase of Ipad 128GB
Reviews.Author: Robin Breard
Reviews.Content: I recently upgraded my mother's ipad.  The ipad was delivered a day earlier than expected and in good condition.  The product itself is extremely fast and the transition from the old one was easy!  I have nothing negative to say about this product or this purchase, therefore gave it a 5 star rating!

Reviews.Title: All that I expected.
Reviews.Author: Francisco
Reviews.Content: It's all we all know about iPad. Just a slim, elegant, and very great tablet. Apple delivers innovation once again.

Reviews.Title: This was a present and  she loved
Reviews.Author: Jose L. Martinez
Reviews.Content: Buy this for my. Wife at first I  was in dub but now. She like it  special  the camaraderie and the easy access to the web

Reviews.Title: Late is better than never
Reviews.Author: ceisenhauer3
Reviews.Content: It didn't say at the time, but apparently it was back-ordered. So even though it was Amazon Prime, it took 5 or 6 days to get to me. Other than that, everything about it is perfect and brand new. Couldn't love it more

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: MylB
Reviews.Content: Ok - wasn't what I expected... Heavy, hangs up sometimes, not as responsive to stylus as I'd like. Beautiful display though and lots of space!

Reviews.Title: Ok, now I am not going back to my PC ;D
Reviews.Author: marie s
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this purchase and I love the iPad 4. I also love that it is going to save my back while traveling. With the apps that Apple provides, numbers, pages, and Keynote, I can do oh so many things. I am budget minded and this was a big purchase for me. No buyers remorse, just a wonderful piece of equipment that I can see helping me in my work.I can even edit photos and slip them in to my docs just like at home. Now the hours of flight are not wasted but my own personal office.There was a learning curve for me but it has been rather fun. It does help if you have used any of their other products.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Deal Queen :-)
Reviews.Content: My husband really wanted an iPad.  I found this iPad on Amazon for a terrific price compared to anywhere else that I looked.  He is very happy with the product and uses it every day!

Reviews.Title: My Wife Loves It
Reviews.Author: kelly
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a birthday gift for my wife.  She uses it every day, and cannot stop raving about it!  We have Apple laptops and phones, so it allows for everything to sync together.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with the iPad
Reviews.Author: D. J. Bell
Reviews.Content: As an owner of a Mac this iPad completes my needs. I can't wait to learn how to use it easily. Apple electronics are the best.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Heather Bowen "Happyfungirl"
Reviews.Content: This iPad is really nice! Takes great pics and I just love it!!! I can do just about anything I could on my laptop!

Reviews.Title: Up to Date with the new IPad
Reviews.Author: M. J. Auten
Reviews.Content: I had the very first iPad and was reluctant to give it up. But once I got this new 4th Generation, I am happy that I did. So many more bells and whistles to play with!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Z
Reviews.Content: My second iPad, the best part about this was the price.  I knew what to expect from the iPad, works consistently, good battery life, but best part was price.  Saved $350 buying this over comparable iPad Air.  I never buy the latest apple product because the last one is almost as good as always deeply discounted.  Also, having the sim chip slot is great, I have unlimited international/domestic data on my work sim and with a great website can build an APN profile and take advantage of that sim in my iPad.

Reviews.Title: This was a wonderful device!
Reviews.Author: L. Jeske
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unit to replace the unit that I returned, since this is a much better unit: it has a 1.3 mg pixel camera, versus the previous one that has 0.9 mg pixel front camera, much better suited for skyping. Unfortunately, I had an accident, with this unit being a casualty: I was on a cruise ship and it was accidentally knocked overboard. Not to worry: My insurance took care of it! I bought a replacement one with a white bezel and more storage space(32GB), with which I'm very happy. As noted on another review, the only drawback with the Ipad is that there's no room for expansion of storage space and you cannot just watch any video off line that you want: it has to be compatible with the Ipad. However, there is a workaround to that. watch your videos from a cloud drive such as dropbox (icloud doesn't work)

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad with Retina display
Reviews.Author: Thomas W Wooff
Reviews.Content: Great Ipad. I Love it and the retina display is awesome. No issues at all. Shipping was fast. 128 gb of memory is great for lots of games and music.

Reviews.Title: iPad review
Reviews.Author: Louise Aiken
Reviews.Content: Enjoying this product very much ,very pleased. Love being to take pictures with it and have face time with  my grandchildren

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad with Retina Display MD514LL/A 32GB
Reviews.Author: Lindy Matherly "I like to read Christian, par...
Reviews.Content: I really like the size, the crisp photos. I have a IPhone & IMac it is great that I can sync all 3 with just a setting.

Reviews.Title: A Most Elegant Electronic Device
Reviews.Author: JM
Reviews.Content: I bought this ipad as a birthday gift for my wife. I don't personally use Apple stuff but was none the less impressed with this device. It was extremely easy for my wife to set up and sync with her iphone. She has not had any problems with it whatsoever, the screen is beautiful, and I didn't have to do anything technical for her. (I'm the tech guy in the family) Birthday done, wife stoked, totally easy. My only complaint, the device is a bit pricey. It's an Apple product, nuff said.

Reviews.Title: great ipad
Reviews.Author: Desire Yameogo
Reviews.Content: I appreciate ipad design and great content especially the possibility to be connected everywhere with possibility of listenning radios and watching TV worlldwide. I will recommend ipad to all my contacts. Great job!

Reviews.Title: Gift for wife
Reviews.Author: David Repass
Reviews.Content: Needed an ipad for dish network and this one should work ok for what we want it for - still testing

Reviews.Title: My new iPad
Reviews.Author: Mookie
Reviews.Content: I really love it.  It's beyond my expectations.  I'm so glad I bought it.  Thank you Amazon. Your price was the best

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad
Reviews.Author: bear22 "Gary Parmentier"
Reviews.Content: One of the reasons I purchased the Ipad for my wife was so she could use Face time.  We've had it for over 3 weeks and after calls and visit to Apple store have unable to get Face Time to work.  We have tried at several different venues so that seem to rule out router problems.  Heard rumor that Apple itself is having problems with "Face Time"  Not too Happy!

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: This was a purchase for my mother. She has already gotten hours of enjoyment and I expect she will for years to come. Awesome buy for the price and with 64gb. She will have a unit that's usable for a long time to come.

Reviews.Title: Best Buy..Love this!
Reviews.Author: larry chaney
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a new or upgrade iPad.  I think this Apple is the very best for the money and great price from Amazon!

Reviews.Title: It is what it said
Reviews.Author: marebear
Reviews.Content: I've seen many other iPads since this purchase i know i over paid. My fault for not shopping around. But it's worked just fine. If over 600$ is fine for a ipad.

Reviews.Title: Still testing capabilities
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: Works well, mine in wi fi and sprint enabled.  Sprint does not have unlimited data option.  I would have selected another cell carrier had I known and the limited data options are quite expensive.  Mass deleting of emails is more of a chore than it should be.

Reviews.Title: sent wrong color
Reviews.Author: Susan Lohse
Reviews.Content: When I reported this to the seller he simply said "oh well, that was Apple'sscrew up." Not too pleased

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Melissa F.
Reviews.Content: Great price, although the box that the ipad was in was dropped on the corner, and there was a small scuff on the corner of the ipad.

Reviews.Title: Great price!
Reviews.Author: M. Cornett
Reviews.Content: I was expecting a refurbished product based on the price, but as far as I could tell, it seemed brand new.  It was in the original packaging and was in flawless condition.  Like other tablets we have had, it seemed to take a few good full charges for the battery to keep a charge for a long time, but it works well now and the battery lasts a decent amount of time considering how much I use the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Superb device- great service
Reviews.Author: Spartan 6
Reviews.Content: As with all Apple products- superb device and function-- married this one with a Belkin key board- arrived early and in perfect condition!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Marilyn  Wirth
Reviews.Content: I just love my iPad.  The picture is very clear.  Reponse is quick and correct.  The help icons are easy to understand.  Marilyn W

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Came in perfect conditions. I didn't run into any problems so far. Easy to set up and I recommend this to anyone who what a tablet.

Reviews.Title: good one
Reviews.Author: Tutan
Reviews.Content: i will like that, actually 4th is a little bit heavier, but it's an ipad.i love it so far.

Reviews.Title: Excellent iPad
Reviews.Author: ScaperGal "Farscape is still awesome.  Get th...
Reviews.Content: Bought this as I've wanted one for ages but because of the cost was unable to afford a new one.  This one was as good as new.  I'm slowly getting to know my iPad and working out how "Apple" works.  No complaints about the iPad to date.  Prompt shipping and arrived in near new condition.

Reviews.Title: Birthday gift
Reviews.Author: Gregory Thornton
Reviews.Content: It was a birthday gift for our daughter, who tells us that she loves it, is using if for both personal and business (teacher) purposes/

Reviews.Title: Ipad 4
Reviews.Author: Yen Nguyen
Reviews.Content: Nice upgrade to the Ipad series, but still the same thing as an Ipad 3 expect a little faster. If you have the money then go for it.

Reviews.Title: Love but wish it could hold a charge longer.
Reviews.Author: Beth Parker
Reviews.Content: Love this device for traveling. However doesn't seem to hold a charge for more then 5 hours. I bought primarily for use when I travel but couldn't use for entire flights (international)

Reviews.Title: Takes some time to get use to it.
Reviews.Author: vark
Reviews.Content: Takes some time, but learning along the way, it be super if it ( the instructions were written in a manual ) of how to use it, but u got to learn from the internet or good ole fashion experience of using the product.  I do like it, for the cost was a wee bit high.

Reviews.Title: THE PURCHASE OF MY APPLE AIR IPAD
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Denier
Reviews.Content: I am so very  pleased with my Apple ipad. It is everything I've read & heard about &more.; The screen is the perfect size for me and I love the quick start up.They have made a wonderful product which makes  using the internet a breeze..I just wish they would include a users manual with the product because there is so much more to learn about.R.D.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Tablet!
Reviews.Author: David Ellis
Reviews.Content: There is a reason why the apple ipad is rated the #1 tablet.  This product was easy to set up and a full charge lasts a whopping 12 hours.  I am completely delighted in this purchase and I will recommend it to a friend or relative without any hesitation at all. Although there is a learning curve to learn everything this tablet can do, this is undoubtedly the best tablet on the market and there is an endless list of things it is capable of doing. A very user friendly tablet and the retina display is absolutely stunning. As of now, the retina display on this tablet is considered the most stunning, sharpest and crisp display that is possible. I am completely satisfied even though I havent even scratched the surface of what it is capable of doing. Great tablet!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: david hamlin
Reviews.Content: Ease of use.  More practical than using my laptop for checking mail and browsing.  Would highly recommend for home or travel.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: betsy
Reviews.Content: Great value and believe me I checked it out. This is my first ipad and it was an easy transits ion!

Reviews.Title: almost like new
Reviews.Author: summer
Reviews.Content: It's renewed and everything works fine...only that it gets hot when used a long time and it charges slowly..I guess it's a general problem with ipad4 then.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Michael White
Reviews.Content: The product was what I expected and functions just as it should. Looking forward to many hours of use, thank you.

Reviews.Title: iPad Nation
Reviews.Author: Diamond Diva
Reviews.Content: I have joined the iPad nation and it sure feels great!! Cant wait to see what cool accessories I can get as well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent delivery
Reviews.Author: Kwame763
Reviews.Content: The product arrived next day as promised, and really, really needed it to travel. So far it's being working perfectly fine and I'm really excited about it. Amazon is great..!

Reviews.Title: A nice gift
Reviews.Author: Paul Desimone
Reviews.Content: Sorry I couldn't review this purchase previously.  I had to wait until I could give it to my wife for an anniversary gift to know how she liked it.She is enjoying exploring its many capabilities, and shouldn't exhaust that research any time soon.  Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Everyone in the family loves it
Reviews.Author: Julie K. White
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son but his whole family loves it.  His son loves playing games, they all love watching movies and it's a great portable light weight answer to a computer for travel!

Reviews.Title: Hat finder
Reviews.Author: Hat finder
Reviews.Content: Bought for my husband.  He likes it very much.  He was very frustrated to have to shift from Blackberry phone which he loved to Motorola Droid.  His place of employment no longer supported the Blackberry device. This IPad 4 is much more user friendly and he can use it for everything except the phone calls for which he still uses the Droid phone.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Tarita Murphy
Reviews.Content: I love this thing, it came fully charge so I used it straight from the box it's fast and easy to sync to my iTunes, and the battery life is awesome.

Reviews.Title: First apple product
Reviews.Author: Michael Gignac
Reviews.Content: First time for an apple product, am satisfied so far. Service from apple is fast and helpful, battary life of the unit is good.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 4 is the best
Reviews.Author: Patrick W. Rutherford
Reviews.Content: Love this thing! MUCH better than the iPad 1 I had years ago.  Can do so much more.Love it.

Reviews.Title: Ipad is great
Reviews.Author: StoneCreek Mercantile
Reviews.Content: No issues..easy to use. My wife wants one.it is heavier than her kindle. Need this for work as it is the only OS we can use for my job.

Reviews.Title: Love it love it love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Noah Schrock "Noah"
Reviews.Content: I always wanted the iPad but knew they coul be pretty pricey but this was the best deal around and we could not be happier! We love having the 128 GB so we have plenty of storage. Absolutely amazing!

Reviews.Title: Fine device
Reviews.Author: Duane Linstrom
Reviews.Content: This works every bit as well as it's supposed to. It's handy and easy to use. It's well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Love my iPad. Apple selling these for $399
Reviews.Author: E. Tirums
Reviews.Content: Just an FYI to anyone looking to purchase a 4th gen iPad 16gb. You can get these direct from Apple for $399. Hopefully Amazon will realize this and lower their price accordingly.Perhaps its an incentive to buy a Kindle Fire? Don't. Once you go iPad you'll never go back. Either buy direct from Apple or wait for Amazon to catch up on their pricing. Retina display is worth it. I'm a PC/droid guy but IMO you can't beat the iPad and iPod.

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: Kendra Hinman
Reviews.Content: I'm a first time iPad owner, and I'm loving this device.  Chose the 4th generation to save a little money and I'm not disappointed.  Easy and Fun!

Reviews.Title: My first apple product
Reviews.Author: Nancy Sederberg
Reviews.Content: I have been amazed that it is so easy to use this iPad.  I am still learning, and don't know how to use all the features yet.  But my 12 year old grandson has been giving me tips and helpful advice over the phone.  The screen is bright and easy to read.  The features are very intuitive.  I highly recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display 64
Reviews.Author: D. Pappas "DenVette"
Reviews.Content: Bought this as an upgrade since my wife took my iPad 2 as her own.  Quicker and faster that the 2 and the screen is much better.

Reviews.Title: iPad............Glad I bought it
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Dube "Kindlefan"
Reviews.Content: I am sooooooooo happy with my iPad! Everything went smooth from paying for it and getting it on time. I had to sell an iPad when I was unemployed and I missed it. I purchased an iPad mini and was less than satisfied with it. I decided to purchase a regular sized iPad and I am very satisfied with my purchase. Thank you!!!!

Reviews.Title: very nice with my Ipod
Reviews.Author: Edgar lopez
Reviews.Content: I didn't have a time to working too much in my iPod, buth great so far, thank you, apple is always good

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Wendy W
Reviews.Content: I love my new iPad 4!!  I'm writing this review on it :)  It was delivered quickly and the price was fair.  The set up was a breeze.  It is 100 times better than my old lap top, it's faster, and easier to carry around.  The screen has a crisp image.  I can do so many things on the iPad from surfing the net to watching videos and playing games.  How did I ever survive without my iPad?

Reviews.Title: Good Price, Great Delivery
Reviews.Author: J. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Not only is my nw iPad 4 fast with a gorgeous screen, this seller exceeded my expectations by delivering the item several days before it was expected. Good job! I'm completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Korey G.
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was expecting. The iPad is awesome to have. The retina display is amazing for movies and games.

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: jennifer voyles
Reviews.Content: Have had no problems with it, easy to use.  Product came to me on the date expected, still in the plastic.  I am very pleased with this purchase and am looking for one for my husband.

Reviews.Title: i cant put it down
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: i cant put it down! im so happy with this purchase. I wanted one forever and now i have one!

Reviews.Title: It is Apple
Reviews.Author: Assaf Alakeel
Reviews.Content: Great choice from all Ipad's generation. Have almost pest generation of iPad. Same new one with cheap price. Perfect function.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Mr. Bustabuns
Reviews.Content: I am somewhat disappointed with the Ipad.  So far, it refuses to synk with my pc, likely because it is not a Mac.  I have had to use Google Drive to get my files in.  Hopefully it just once of these kink I have to work out.  Other than that, it's a very cook tablet and the while color is especially nice.  On look, 100 out of 10; on functionality, 7 out of 10.

Reviews.Title: I pad 4
Reviews.Author: poncho
Reviews.Content: This was a like new iPad 4 with retina display when it was delivered it looks brand-new and was described exactly it works perfectly I am very happy

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!
Reviews.Author: Domenico Capolupo
Reviews.Content: I am shocked at how well this item works.  I would certainly recommend it to many others.  Great buy for a great price!

Reviews.Title: Preowned and Pristine
Reviews.Author: misty
Reviews.Content: I ordered my package from nextworth and recived a wonderfully clean and undamaged product. Crystal clear retina display and even a 75% charge on the battery.I only give my iPad a four star review because the seller included the wrong charger with my device. I recieved a 30 pin style charger instead of the new lightning cord.  I'm bummed but the contact sheet did have a number that allowed me to report the issue quickly and the customer service was polite and timely about resolving my issue.Great device, good price and a sturdy alternative to the thinner iPad air. There's no reason to buy an air this device processes very quickly and responds brillantly. A normal 64gb iPad will be about $800 newI got my device at half price! Couldn't be happier with my first amazon experience even though it looks like i'll have to wait until monday to fully synch my device.

Reviews.Title: Apple discontinued this device for the crappy 2G
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Fast and seamless.  Excellent battery life.  Awesome app selection.  If you got the skrillz to drop on a device like this, then go for it! You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Best Deal Ever.
Reviews.Author: kbrown
Reviews.Content: Perfect condition.  Love it!!!!!!!!  Works great.  New condition.  Can't believe I got this at such a low price.  Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Apple hits a home run.
Reviews.Author: Stuart Schiffbauer
Reviews.Content: What can you say, another great Apple product that made Steve Jobs a gazzillionaire.  Good product, easy to operate, vibrant color, just wished it had a usb port.

Reviews.Title: rate
Reviews.Author: Lois Nusberger
Reviews.Content: I love it.I have a lot to learn but have put many things in the note apt so I can review.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished iPad
Reviews.Author: ST
Reviews.Content: So far, so good.  Different, if you're not used to Apple but pretty user friendly.  Haven't 100% gotten on to it but think it's going to be pretty cool.  I'm old so it takes a little longer but I'll get there.  Also got a keyboard case and the keyboard works like a charm.

Reviews.Title: So Far So good
Reviews.Author: Jolynn Raymond
Reviews.Content: We like this Ipad. It is pretty easy to get the hang of it, has great screen resolution, and runs as it should 95% of the time. It seems to have issues with a few of the apps, but other than that issue, does what we bought it for,

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it
Reviews.Author: Ex Texan
Reviews.Content: This was one of her Christmas presents from me, and she is constantly using it, learning it, etc.  I thought "I did good" a couple of years back when I got her the Nook, but this unit was a "grand slam".  She talks with both our daughters and is learning new things about the unit daily.

Reviews.Title: It works...condition was not as promised.
Reviews.Author: J. bransfield
Reviews.Content: I purchased this iPad with the understanding the box was damaged.  When I received the iPad the box was damaged, the iPad was scratched and the edges were dented.  From a distance it looked ok, but up close it was not what I expected.  There could have been a warning about the condition of the hardware, but I did not see such a warning.  I little disappointed.

Reviews.Title: I love It!
Reviews.Author: glenda
Reviews.Content: I purchased 128GB iPad a few months back and love it!!! It is so nice having all that extra memory! I am an artist, photographer  and musician....It handles all my needs & then some!

Reviews.Title: Thanks!
Reviews.Author: Michael Mullin
Reviews.Content: The iPad can very well packaged and looked in excellent condition. My only criticisms are probably not related to the seller. The iPad charges extremely slowly compared to my iPhone. The camera on the iPad is really horrible quality.

Reviews.Title: Woks as expected
Reviews.Author: Daniel P. Malaney
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use, but could have come with instructions for those unfamiliar with Apple products.  Slightly heavy to hold.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 4th generation
Reviews.Author: R. Kanno "rk4runner"
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift for my sister and she is amazed by it. I told her to take the free Apple classes that is offered and she is in the process of doing that. She is one happy person.

Reviews.Title: More glitches and crashes
Reviews.Author: B. Stasiak "dr.brittster"
Reviews.Content: I'm convinced people go crazy over apple products solely because of the out of control trend of owning everything apple. Personally, my iPad has crashed and glitches constantly since day one, on an every day basis. I replaced it. Same problem. There are so many better products out there, but somehow the iPad is rated as number one everywhere you go. Sure, the access to apps are nice. But I've had cheap laptops with far less problems, and you could actually use it for more than apps and web browsing. Way over priced.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Blair Stephenson
Reviews.Content: It's not as powerful a processor as the AIR nor as light of course but a fine item to have

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Clay
Reviews.Content: Answered all questions I had and came in just 3 days! iPad I bought no scratches look brand new! 5 Star!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Keven L. Barber
Reviews.Content: Retina Display is great.  Ability to use cellular service when wifi too slow worth it's weight in gold. Great Product!

Reviews.Title: Present for wife
Reviews.Author: LowMetallurgy
Reviews.Content: No complaints here.  Typical Apple reliability, usability, and more importantly, the wife loves it!  Plenty of storage for our needs.

Reviews.Title: Lovelock lovelock!
Reviews.Author: Nancy S. "NancyBookWorm"
Reviews.Content: That sums it up!  This is the best device yet and so I am now Apple-happy.  I tell everyone to buy one over a laptop because it is faster, more easily portable and very user friendly.  The price was comparable, arrived safely on time.  I only use my laptop now for printing jobs (next time we get a wireless printer to use with my iPad) and longer documents.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it....it works awesome and easy to use .....thank you
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: It was perfect. We charged it up and was ready to go, hooked up to internet easily. The wife loves it for how easily she can surf her favorite sites.

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: C. Pringle "ga peach"
Reviews.Content: This is our first iPad and we love it. The Retina display is sharp and clear. Love Facetime-ing with our granddaughter. So much easier than other video chat tools we've used in the past. Camera does a very nice job too.  Be aware that the iTunes default is to automatically charge for in-app fees. You may want to disable this immediately as we were warned to do, especially if you have children using it.  We actually disable all stores and only enable them when we need to use them.

Reviews.Title: Better than my Laptop
Reviews.Author: TomPack "Martinsburg"
Reviews.Content: This new iPad is what I now use on a daily basis. I only bring out the laptop for certain connections and viewing. the iPad Air is light, battery life is excellent - 12 hours give or take. Ties into the Wifi quickly and holds. Browser, Siri, Facetime all work very well without any glitches.

Reviews.Title: Nice product.
Reviews.Author: Dale Holtrey
Reviews.Content: I'm used to a PC, so the IPad is a little hard to get used to.  I do like it because it can be kept beside my easy chair, then right up on my lap.  I am glad I bought it.  I like the FaceTime feature, because I can see my grandchildren as I talk to them.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Linda Greenberg "LRG"
Reviews.Content: I have an adroid phone and I was planning on buying an android tablet.  But I didn't like the ones that were already out.  I waited for the Nexus 10 2 - but I am not sure it will every appear.  Buyiing the iPad was a good decision as I have an iMac computer.  I will eventually buy an iPhone.  I have put photo albums on the pad and the pictures look beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Great One....
Reviews.Author: farhan sayed
Reviews.Content: Good to have tablet like this. One cannot find everything in one but considering that I'll have it for at least a years. I used it every day  and so far no complaint. if you are looking for tablet then don't miss this.

Reviews.Title: iPad purchase
Reviews.Author: DEBRA JARETT
Reviews.Content: Great iPad and so useful... Shipped fast and super easy transaction... Very happy with the entire purchase... I am using it right now to write this review!

Reviews.Title: Best Apple Product great for college
Reviews.Author: Brooks Langford
Reviews.Content: The best thing I have ever bought on Amazon and I have bought some pretty great things.  My favorite Apple product and i actually own a 5S and a Macbook Air.

Reviews.Title: What did you expect?
Reviews.Author: MrsP
Reviews.Content: I can't come up with a single complaint.  It's an Apple, it's an Ipad, everything works perfectly, I got a great price.  What else!

Reviews.Title: Amazing. We love it. THE ONLY TABLET TO EVER BUY! Imitators can't even come close.
Reviews.Author: Kurt P
Reviews.Content: Amazing. We love it. THE ONLY TABLET TO EVER BUY! Imitators can't even come close.Incredible battery lifesuper fast and responsiveyou can feel the quality once you hold it in your handthe RETINA DISPLAY is AMAZING!!!! Never go back to a regular display after using itwith apple TV you can steam content from your iPAD to your TV in real time. Pictures, Movies, music, games etc...I would recommend this tablet to ANYONE. You can't go wrong with this device. You will NOT be disappointed. Their is a reason why Apple is the industry leader and it's because of devices like this. Don't fall for cheaper imitators and look a likes. Nothing compares to the iPad.

Reviews.Title: An amazing platform for browsing, media, and iOS apps!
Reviews.Author: C-Dub
Reviews.Content: I was slow to justify the cost of an iPad and despite being a long time fan of Macs, didn't really see the need for one. I found myself in a job where I am on very remote locations with quite a bit of downtime and finally decided that I could use one.I have been absolutely thrilled with this device. It is extremely stable, even with the new iOS 7 operating system. I am very happy that I chose the Retina model, because the screen is basically perfect. For everything from web browsing to watching Netflix, the quality of video and images is second to none.App performance on the iPad Retina is superb, and many of the iPad specific apps are simply mind-blowing, particularly some of the art apps like Sketchbook Pro and Procreate. I recently acquired an Adonit Jot 4, which is a pressure sensitive stylus that connects via Bluetooth, and it works like something out of the future. Just crazy good. For forum participation, writing Amazon reviews, etc., I prefer my laptop simply because I don't like typing on a touchscreen, but that's just my personal preference. I can get around on the touchscreen and if I really wanted a physical keyboard, there are several available. But that's not really what the iPad is all about. It's not there to replace your computer; it's a different type of device that excels at browsing and media consumption and is portable in a way that no laptop is.Though it takes a bit longer than I would like to take a full charge, the battery life is excellent, and I rarely find myself needing to charge when I am out and about.As a media consumption / web browsing device, the iPad Retina is ideal. The screen is so amazing that it is generally preferable to me over a larger computer or laptop screen for these purposes. I take a star off of my rating because USB connectivity would be REALLY helpful for those who would like to watch movies that they have stored on an external drive. There really is no reason that the iPad shouldn't have USB.I love my iPad, and it is so usable in this current configuration that I don't see myself having to replace it with the latest and greatest for many years.

The box was wrapped in plastic to make it look new but was obviously not the same plastic that comes from the factory.  I have read of others having the same experience with the ipadshop. Regarding this model, the only major difference between the 4th generation & the 3rd is a more powerful processor, but the amazing Retina screen remains the same - & as someone with a 2013 Macbook Air too which doesn't have a Retina display, the Retina screen is quite a difference.  I use my MA more for computing, while the iPad (to me) is more of an entertainment device - & its screen is definitely perfect for it.  Pixelation is all but a thing of the past with this baby!  Overall, I use this for Netflix & YouTube (& occasionally checking email, Facebook, etc.), but really, for a tablet & everything that goes with that, the iPad is everything you could ask for.

Reviews.Content: I am so happy with my iPad! I love everything about it!  It came sooner then I thought it would and was very happy with the sender! Thanks again!

Reviews.Title: Good product but no WOW affect

Reviews.Content: Surprised at my expected response from this product.  Sometimes when I swipe on the lower part of the screen the pages do not advance, I have to move slightly higher to get the pages to turn.  I expected more i guess.

Reviews.Title: Yes Love is the word :)

Reviews.Content: This 128GB iPad has been totally enjoyed by my son, I gave it to him because he would use my corporate iPad endlessly and you know  I needed it too.My son is autistic and this device keeps him focused and gaming for now.There are apps for speech games that I will load for him as we go forward.I would recommend this iPad to all people of earth.Thank You

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Peter Trevor Lamontagne
Reviews.Content: I did not have tothink too much about this.  I got an iPad six months ago and my wife wanted a similar one.  Wish I couldhave kept this newer version.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: Fast, simple and efficient. This is the perfect gadget, the retina display is amazing and the battery is the best.

Reviews.Title: High Quality IPad
Reviews.Author: Kcsrider "Kcsrider"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this IPad to give to my wife as a gift a year ago.  She uses it endlessly for anything and everything.  Her laptop gets very little use anymore.  The screen is a bit fragile, and Apple wants an arm and a leg to replace the glass if it breaks.  A high quality case is a wise investment, not only for ease of use, but for protection from breakage.  These things are expensive, but well worth the money if you use a computer much or require portability.  No more laptops on vacation!

Reviews.Title: Best yet!
Reviews.Author: Susie "Proof Reader Wannabe"
Reviews.Content: I had the iPad 2 and loved it but I quickly ran out of room with only 64GB between my music, movies and books after 2 years. But I did not want a smaller screen. So, the iPad 4 meets my needs perfectly. I am not a gamer, so not having Flash really is no big deal. Love that Siri is included with this version. No more typing emails! With the addition of Apple TV I can watch movies on the iPad or TV. Just wish Apple and Amazon would share their respective Gateways on both Apple TV and Roku. I could not afford both and would love to be able to use Amazon Video player on my TV without the need for extra accessories.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product

Reviews.Content: The Apple IPad with Retina Display is a joy to use...it has made me more productive and it has made my worklife more organized....the carmera is a plus--great photos! I recommend downloading the user's guide to get the most out of the product as quickly as possible.

Reviews.Title: Great

So i took the plunge. I was not disappointed, but what really amazed me was amazing the web(facebook, internet reading etc...) look on this device. it is crystal clear and so much easier on the eye than my laptop or iphone. it's literally the perfect size. photos look exactly like what they are supposed to look like. I also love this model as it's the "budget" model with the smallest hard drive and no phone service. i just hook it up to wifi and i'm set. Also i don't need a lot hard drive space as i'm not really storing anything on it, just accessing the web.

Reviews.Content: I love the Android environment but the ipad is still the best tablet you can buy.  ios feels a bit boring and outdated but everything runs so smoothly. Retina display is gorgeous and online browsing with Safari is just the best. And of course the thousands of apps available are a pleasure to use on this tablet.  The build quality of the hardware is unmatched.  There's nothing plasticky about this tablet.  It's just plain solid.  Well worth the $499 I spent on the 16 gb version.

Reviews.Author: A.S.
Reviews.Content: At this point I have to rate this product a 1 because after TEN HOURS of charging it wont work.  Not with the "on/home" button trick, nada.  All I ever got on the screen was the low battery symbol when I first plugged it in and now nada.  Very disappointed and now have to go through the ordeal of returning it when I really do not have the time as this was purchased using a grant and I have less than a month to show success with students using it or it comes out of my pocket.  Joy.

Reviews.Title: Reasons I don't like iPad
Reviews.Author: M&M; "MyTrueComment"
Reviews.Content: Tablets are now better and better.  When iPad 2 came out, it was good.  iPad 4 spec was appealing.  However, I found there are some issues on iPad 4.1.  Heavy.  It is as heavy as 7 inch blackberry playbook.2.  It has been like that on setup.  You need iTune or wifi.  I don't have a Windows PC or Mac, and I need mac address to connect to my router.  How can I do it?  Apple did not think about this problem.3.  No setup guide, not a sheet of instruction.4.  Not to mention the price cost more than others.I have not connect the tablet yet.  Probably let me kid connect to his iTune and get the Mac address.  More to come.I have the ASUS tf700, and I like it a lot.  My opinion, it is better than iPad.

Reviews.Title: I am not sure whether I should rate it as 1 star, but
Reviews.Author: Xuebo
Reviews.Content: The fact is that I bought this on amazon as a gift to my wife as a bday gift. I ordered it on Monday night, it arrived on Thurs afternoon. Slightly slower than what I expected (I am amazon prime, so I have 2 day delivery free). But that is ok.The product was delivered in sealed condition with "original" package ---- at least I could not find any sign of previous usage or anything. Everything so far is so good.Then we started to initialize this Ipad. It gave me black screen for a short time, which I thought it was just normal --- probably it was loading something. And after that, it seemed to be normal all the way to the end of the setup phase. The next thing we do is to download google Chrome on it. It briefly showed a "shaky" "blurred" screen for a second or so. And then back to normal.Then we started to explore its functionality like taking pictures etc. The frequency of "shaky" screen by now increases. Then we tried to download some free games. After we downloaded the first free game (I do not remember which, our purpose was just testing) app, it went black. This time for 15 minutes or so. This time, I do not think it is normal any more.But after that, we were able to restart it. Just to find that it is now a norm of showing shaky screens all the time. And then we were browsing to find apple support using it. It is then the whole thing died. It won't come back any more. So we had to send it back.I do not know who I should blame the problem to, or just unlucky to hit this one.

Reviews.Title: UPDATED 09-24-2013 came with a screeen scratch and problem with with iIOS 7
Reviews.Author: Carlos Garcia CCS-400097
Reviews.Content: I would have given it 5 stars. But even though the Amazon Market Place's packaging for shipment was as good as required for shipping and delivering this type of merchandise, and that the Apple iPad factory box was undamaged, both wrappings intact and unopened, the iPad screen came with a noticeable two centimeter hairline scratch on top center, right below the camera lens. The scratch was visible through the factory envelope-like cellophane wrapping around the iPad itself. That type of scratch, could not had happened at the seller's warehouses, nor during transportation/delivery because it requires direct contact with the screen to produce it and as I explained the delivery package and product box where undamaged and unopened, so responsibility lies with manufacturing facility during or before final boxing of the iPad, which says a little of quality assurance and control in this case. That is, I do not blame Amazon nor the seller for the problem in this particular case (first time ever).That aside, the new iPad is working nicely and has a great retina display (colors, graphics, resolution...) and great speed. But I still will not give it the fourth and fifth stars, because contrary to what I'm used, and expect, to get from Apple products, this one didn't have that mint condition look that I expected from and Apple's new item. Instead of going trough the process of returning with all the time delay and implications (customs in my country for once)I installed a anti-glare/mate screen protector to "hide" the scratch, which somehow defeats the purpose of the great retina displayIMPORTANT UPDATE: IOS 7 have a feature that cannot be turned of, which verifies that the Lightning connector is certified by Apple, and as soon as I update to IOS 7, and connected my iPad to be charged with the Lightning connector that came with the iPad in the original, brand new, sealed and unopened factory box I got a pop up display that stated that my iPad connector isn't certified and my not function properly with my iPad. I reported this to apple via chat support and the agent told me, after running an online diagnostic, that my device and connectors were new and that it was a glitch in the IOS 7 verifying routine that would be fixed on a next release (update of IOS 7), so I dismissed (every time) the message and charged my iPad without problems. But that was until today, after connecting the new iPad with the supposedly original Apple lightning connector and receiving the  warning message, the iPad stop charging after reaching 27% charge. Beware, either don't buy this model or wait until Apple issues some kind of correction or update removing that verifying routine from IOS 7. Right now for me, living outside the US this is a disaster, returning the device, for me is not an option. So I will have to take my iPad to a Venezuelan authorized service center, testing and probably buying a new "original" lightning connector, cause if I buy the Apple care plan in the US It won't be applicable in my country.

Reviews.Title: This bad boy rocks!!!!
Reviews.Author: SB
Reviews.Content: Everything good about this device which you may have heard by now is total truth.  I bought this exact model yesterday and I have just one problem.  I can't put it down!I did a side by side comparison with my old iPad and it's like holding a rotary phone next to a smartphone.  No comparison.  Until I started using this new model yesterday, I didn't think I was missing anything but I was wrong.  So what are you waiting for?  Go buy one and see for yourself!Setup took no time because I regularly use iTunes and was able to replicate all the contents from my old iPad to my new one.  I think my hubbie might have to have one too so he can enjoy it once in a while.  Prying it out of my hands is outta the question.  :DI recommend a Satellite wireless external Hard Drive and a leather cover with pro Bluetooth keyboard and a 2 yr extended warranty.  I figure by then, there will be something new to buy anyway.I might just go back to reading books now too.  Any excuse to use this baby.  ;)

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: What can I say...great product. I'm not a very techie person but the iPad is user friendly, light, and has a great battery life. The display is crystal clear. I did have to update the software when it arrived because the camera and photo app would not work. I was ready to go the Apple store for them to trouble shoot it but my friend figured it out first.

Reviews.Title: Careful- wrong iPad sent
Reviews.Author: js
Reviews.Content: The box showed the latest iPad A1458 but the older model was in the box (A1416) along with the older style 30-pin connector.  Sending back for a refund.

Reviews.Title: So  DONE apple products
Reviews.Author: KEK
Reviews.Content: It is not the iPad as much as the apple os updates which keep messing up my iTunes and songs.  I have purchased and extensive library of songs and the past two updates have caused the songs to no longer be found showing them as not available on my iPad but trying to direct me to the cloud.  I think this is apples way of trying to force customers to pay for their cloud space which I am not interested in. It took me Hours to fix it the first time and it has happened again. Since I have all my music also on a backup drive... It is time to try a new tablet and no more apple for us.  Apple support is no help.  We are now looking at a galaxy tab and will go for that and drop all apple products.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade experience
Reviews.Author: Dov
Reviews.Content: I bought the first iPad when it debuted a few years ago and it has gotten heavy use by my wife and son ever since. A few things happened recently. I bought a 13" MacBook Pro, but I haven't completely transferred iTunes from my PC desktop to the MB. That said, when I received this iPad 4 as a gift, I let it sit in the box for a few days while I thought about how I would transfer iTunes to the MB and start the new iPad with a fresh sync. Well, I scrapped that idea and opened the unit anyway. To my surprise, the cloud service automatically copied the apps, calendar, contacts, bookmarks etc to the new unit. I can not describe clear enough what a relief the setup was.I am super happy with this product. The retina display is nice, the speed is very good. I'm happy that all of my computing is so much easier the more I have integrated my data into this Apple world. I have used PC's for over 20 years and have never particularly liked Apple. I only wished I had moved over sooner.

Reviews.Title: So far I am happy with my pleased.
Reviews.Author: buddy d
Reviews.Content: I received the IPAD it was fairly easy to be up and running.  I really enjoy using it my computer was an XPERIA so needed to be replaced and so I am happy

Reviews.Title: Love my Ipad
Reviews.Author: Lochthyme
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone 4s which I use to take photos.  I then will switch over to my iPad to edit some of them for the convenience of being able to see them better....like the large size screen.  Plus some terrific art apps available for the iPad.  I like the large size, the apps available and the retina display.  If you are looking for a tablet the iPad is a terrific choice especially for those who like to do art.  Whether it be drawing, painting or photography.  Lots of terrific apps out there to meet your needs.  Nice size for working on...not too small.  Nice and portable so you can bring it with you where you go.

Reviews.Title: This is awesome
Reviews.Author: rewreviewer
Reviews.Content: I made the mistake to buy the basic model when it came out, glad my roomate bough it from me, I ran out of space very fast, so I bough this model, lots of space and it just works, seriously not sure why you would spend all that money, on the new ones, when your eyes can't not real tell, if you are looking at a retina display or not.This one is perfect, I can download a few movies to waste my time when traveling, battery is awesome, and I really don't miss anything than the new models have at all.great product, thanks guys

Reviews.Title: BEST THING SINCE SLICED BREAD
Reviews.Author: Jo Rae Wolf
Reviews.Content: GO BIG OR STAY HOME THIS IS MY 3rd IPAD IT IS BY FAR THE BEST. MEGA STORAGE WILL LAST MY LIFE TIME.VERY EASY TO DO ANYTHING YOU NEED OR WANT. THIS GIRLS NEW BEST FRIEND.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: VESTALIA TORRES
Reviews.Content: Very good product. tough, durable and economical to use that I give. 100 percent recommended for the purchase of this product.

Reviews.Title: A welcome upgrade
Reviews.Author: Matthew P. Tebussek
Reviews.Content: This is definitely a welcome upgrade to my ipad 2 which hs served me well.  The retina display has twice the pixel density and makes text and pics crystal clear and sharp. Faster processor is nice as well.  If you don't like iOS then this is not for you. Don't listen to the negative reviews if those that do not like apple products. This is a solid piece if hardware from apple. Make sure you do your homework because a lot of the ones listed on here are more than you can buy them for new in the store.  They go for 399 new so don't be fooled.

Reviews.Title: Good iPad
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: No scratches and was delivered on time and works great. Partner loves it and see lots of good use out of this like the majority of apple products

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: SLE
Reviews.Content: I bought this one to save money over the iPad air.  It allowed me to update the operating system for free once I synced it up to my computer, so it's just as good as the newer version.

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: Paulette Lesane
Reviews.Content: I had been meaning to upgrade my iPad to 128GB for some time, but the prices were too high.  I found the best price on Amazon and received the item well before the EDD ( est. del. date).  My overall experience was exactly what I've come to expect from Amazon, Superb!  Thanks for the experience, Paulette.

Reviews.Title: I love this iPad
Reviews.Author: Regina M. Shirley
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is the iPad you want. I upgraded from an iPad 2 to this one. Very glad I did.

Reviews.Title: a brand new ipad
Reviews.Author: Haoqi
Reviews.Content: although it's called a used one, but it looks like a brand new one by all means. feel confident to buy.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Acarsess
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband as a surprise for Christmas gift during the Black Friday promotion. It's a great product and because it came from an authorized Apple dealer, I was able to purchase Apple Care with no problem.  The iPad did not come with a SIM card which I thought it would have.  I contacted the vendor directly and got a response within a few hours of how to get one from AT&T.;  There was no charge for the SIM card.  My husband loves it!

Reviews.Title: Grandson thinks Grandpop is the best for getting him the iPad!
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Curley
Reviews.Content: My grandson loves it. I got him this for Christmas and he has it with him every time he visits. Even takes it to bed. I got the 32GB model, since we learned with the iPod that 16GB doesn't hold much. The resolution on this model is unmatched. I bought it on Amazon cheap enough that I could get a 2 year "Drop N Break" Square Trade warranty, and still had money left over the retail prices.

Reviews.Title: IPad fourth edition
Reviews.Author: Janet R. Showers
Reviews.Content: You sent me a used one as a new one. Full of someone's info. Contacts etc. my grandson who is an IT wiped it clean and I kept it but was very disappointed!!!!

Reviews.Title: Winner
Reviews.Author: Adena
Reviews.Content: Love my iPad, however this need it has to just randomly close out of apps is rather annoying. Other than that the 4th generation was a great cheaper buy for me through Amazon, rather than buying the Air with just not enough differences!

Reviews.Title: ipad with retina display
Reviews.Author: Fathi Jishi
Reviews.Content: This was a present for my son, so I did not use it my self. All I know is that he loves it.

Reviews.Title: Donating these to a church pre-school program.
Reviews.Author: Cecil Kessler
Reviews.Content: Apple is excellent bridge to from pre-school ages to formal schooling.  There are hundreds of apps for use with the Ipad which help teach pre-shoolers.  Great product.  Great potential.

Reviews.Title: 1st time iPad
Reviews.Author: EC505
Reviews.Content: We love how easy it was to use right out of the box.  Connected immediately to our wireless with minimal setup.  Gets a few hours use every day but only needs a charge after 3 or 4 days. Members of the family who swear they "hate technology" use more than anyone else because it is "so easy".

Reviews.Title: I LOVE this iPad
Reviews.Author: Michelle Burchfield
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for his 18th birthday along with a cover/keyboard.  I couldn't have purchased anything better for him to take off to college!

Reviews.Title: iPad/Technology Lover
Reviews.Author: S. Cook "Steel Magnolia"
Reviews.Content: Since I own an iPad 2nd generation (just gave to daughter), iPad Mini, iPhone, iPod, and Kindle Fire, I purchased this larger screen for camera upgrade, and use of DISH Anywhere, HBO GO, etc. for travel/cruising.  Hope the Wi-Fi/AT&T; feature will enable me to use on a cruise in our stateroom and not have to pay exorbitant prices in a "shared" computer room. Now my husband and I both, with our 2 upgraded iPads, can hopefully entertain ourselves when we travel.  Wanted also to have the most current w/128 GB and Wi-Fi + AT&T.;  Love it! However, I still find the data plan and the iCloud data confusing.  When I started this technology "journey," I would have like to have been told that, even after purchasing the product, there are other fees required, which run up the usage bill.Steel MagnoliaBeautiful Smoky Mts.Sevierville, TN

Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong with iPad!

Reviews.Content: Listen to people who own other brand tablets. All they talk about is how their tablet is better than iPad. Now listen to and iPad owner…He is having a nice conversation with you asking about your day?. Wait. Why isn't he talking about other tablets?See what happened there?

Reviews.Title: iPad

Reviews.Content: We started with one of the top-rated android tablets, which is nice, but the iPad blows it away in many ways.  The iPad is so much easier to use and to figure out.  I still use the android, but only for a few applications.

Reviews.Content: I got an Iphone and is my "little" tool in work. But Ipad, is the best for presentations, typing or prepare documents...and PORTABLE.

Reviews.Title: Great item

Reviews.Content: This in a good devise for my needs. There are apps for so many things that open up the iPad to be a useful tool for me. I would definitely recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Fast, Vibrant & Brilliant
Reviews.Author: lismur
Reviews.Content: I love my IPAD, the display is amazing the processor fast & it is the Best IPAD I have ever used, worth the extra money.  I use it every day and my only warning is it is addictive!
